Melee Weapon Attack:
 +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit:
 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

description:
Medium humanoid (any race), any alignment
Acolytes are junior members of a clergy, usually answerable to a priest. They perform a variety of functions in a temple and are granted minor
spellcasting power by their deities.

The acolyte is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell
attacks). The acolyte has following cleric spells prepared:

name: Acolyte
